flawed_nl_solution:
Miles will read for 4 hours because 24 x (1/6) = <<24*1/6=4>>4
He will read each type for 4/3 hours because 4 / 3 = 4/3
He will read 28 pages of novels because 21 x (4/3) = 28
He will read 40 pages of graphic novels because 30 x (4/3) = 40
He will read 60 pages of comic books because 45 x (4/3) = 60
He will read 132 pages in total because 28 + 40 + 60 = <<28+40+60=132>>132

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 128, not 132. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
